changelog:
### Iconify v6.3.1 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Xposed Only Mode:__
    - Long press on "Let's Go" button to open xposed-only mode
- __Brightness Bar:__
    - Use light accent by default for Pixel Variant
- __QS Panel Tiles:__
    - Use light accent by default for Pixel Variant
- __Miscellaneous:__
    - Accent Privacy Chip follow iconify colors
- __Xposed Menu:__
    - Allow disabling Fluid Theme power menu transparency
    - Background Chip follow iconify colors
    - Fix Header Image resetting on theme change

## Translation Credits:
- French @MXC48
- Indonesian @KaeruShi
- Persian @Faceless1999
- Portuguese @ElTifo
- Russian @B1ays
- Simplified Chinese @Cccc-owo

- Vietnamese @viettel1211

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
